metadata.name: the portal
metadata.description:
space is joy - the metaverse badge

a label, a brand, a vision, an avatar

- space is joy -

useable as an avatar photo for your social media profile and on twitter also embeddable as a profile NFT.

what do you stand for?
who are you?
and what do you like to get?

- scientifically proved information 

- fun & entertainment
   with mind-blowing events
   art, dance, music, visuals

- a vibrational community
   with fulfilled relationships
   mental & physical health
   financial abundance


by purchasing this image you are a part of the 
"space is joy" tribe. a digital community that does stand for these topics and values written above.
